SqlTable.SqlScriptCreate: CREATE TABLE [dbo].[KnowledgebaseCategorie] ( [KnowledgebaseCategorie_Ky] int IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL , [KnowledgebaseCategorie_Titolo] varchar(200) NULL , [KnowledgebaseCategorie_UserInsert] int NULL , [KnowledgebaseCategorie_UserUpdate] int NULL , [KnowledgebaseCategorie_UserDelete] int NULL , [KnowledgebaseCategorie_DateInsert] datetime NULL , [KnowledgebaseCategorie_DateUpdate] datetime NULL , [KnowledgebaseCategorie_DateDelete] datetime NULL ) ALTER TABLE [dbo].[KnowledgebaseCategorie] ADD CONSTRAINT PK_KnowledgebaseCategorie PRIMARY KEY ([KnowledgebaseCategorie_Ky])
